page.syntax: L File.Send(C filenames [,C emailaddress[,C options[,C zipname[,C comment[,L use_A5_email_client [,L store_in_outbox [,L show_client ]]]]]]])

argument.name: filenames
argument.description: A string of comma-delimited file names. You must specify the full drive and path of each file in filenames. Wildcard specifications can be used in the list of file names.

argument.name: options
argument.description: Optional. If you specify more than one file, you must use the "C" or "Z" option flag to compress the files into a single zip file. If wildcards are used, the "C" option flag must be specified.

argument.name: zipname
argument.description: Required if wildcards are used. The name of the zip file to create. Otherwise the zip file has the same name as the first file in the list.

argument.name: comment
argument.description: A comment about the files that goes into the subject line.

argument.name: use_A5_email_client
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .F. (FALSE)
.T. = Use Alpha Five email client.
.F. = Use default MAPI email client.

argument.name: store_in_outbox
argument.description:
Optional. Only if Use_A5_Email_Clien t is .T.
.T. = A copy of the message is stored in the Alpha Anywhere email outbox (typically A_EMAIL.DBF in the Alpha Anywhere program folder).
.F. = A copy of the message is not stored in the Alpha Anywhere email outbox.

argument.name: show_client
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .T. (TRUE). Only if the optional Email_Address is specified and Use_A5_Email_Client is .T. Determines whether the Alpha Anywhere email client is displayed before sending files in the case where you select the Alpha Anywhere email client option.
.T. = Show Alpha Five email client before sending email.
.F. = Do not show Alpha Anywhere email client.

page.description: Send one or more files to an address. Options: C or Z = compress (i.e. zip) files before sending.
page.discussion: The FILE.SEND() method sends multiple files via the current MAPI email client, or the built-in Alpha Anywhere email client. If, for example, Use_A5_Email_Client is .F., and the current MAPI email client is Microsoft Outlook, Alpha Anywhere will open Outlook. Similarly, if the email client is Eudora, or Netscape Mail, Alpha Anywhere will open the appropriate email program.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script will send two files. It compress the files first into a zip file called myfiles.zip.
